page.title: 13Local Restaurants
page.content: Near our school there is a variety of restaurants,cafes and take away shops. From the Pond to Strathyre Ave. there are 13 different establishments selling food from all over the world. 2 Indian restaurants, 2 Kebab Take Away shops,2 Greek restaurants, 1 Cantonese Restaurant, 1 Italian restaurant, 1 Snack Bar, 1 Kentucky Fried Chicken shop, 1 Fish and Chip shop, 1 Indonesian Restaurant, 1 Wine Bar. The Snack Bar opens at 8.00am and some of the restaurants close when the last customer leaves about 2.00am. The customers of the shops may be local people or some may stop for a meal while they are travelling. Other people travel a long way to visit a restaurant because they like the food. We think there cannot be many areas where you could buy such a variety of food within such a short distance.
